categories: Category:Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters

nodes.text: War of the Bounty Hunters 2 is the second issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters. It was written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Luke Ross and Neeraj Menon, and published by Marvel Comics on July 14, 2021.

THE BIGGEST COMC [sic] EVENT OF THE STAR WARS GALAXY
CONTINUES! Notorious bounty hunter BOBA FETT has tracked
his missing prize — heroic smuggler HAN SOLO, frozen in
carbonite — to the remote, frozen world of JEKARA. But
representatives from many of the galaxy's most powerful
factions have gathered, and they all want the same thing —
Solo. Things go from bad to worse, as Boba Fett realizes that he
himself has become almost as valuable to the galaxy's hunters
as Han Solo, and he must turn to the least trustworthy person in
the galaxy for help–DOCTOR APHRA–
